title: When i click on play there is no ARURF (All Random Ultra Rapid Fire) able to be selected
body:
I was playing a game last night then when i went to pick it again it was gone and it hasn't come back for me to select it.
whats happening is it gone have i done something wrong please help

replies.body: it might be because it only starts at 11:00 am each day over the weekend... hopefully this helps.
Thanks i was wondering why it one that cause it came back the next day and i got confused
